document_data.name: Kara Calaudra
document_data.mainbody: '''Kara Calaudra''' was the heir of [[Calaudra House]] in [[Melvaunt]] in [[1374 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Kara, like all the Calaudra, was training as a [[wizard]].
document_data.History:
In 1374 DR, she sponsored an adventuring party and had gained some money from her family's treasure. Secretly, she met with her friends [[Argens Bruil]], [[Kalman Leiyraghon]], [[Elaint Marsk]], and [[Oreal Nanther]] planning to go on an adventure, with the support of the [[dwarf]] mercenary [[Dorn Crownshield]].

They found a "treasure map" (in truth, a trap devised by [[Bremen Leiyraghon]]) and went to adventure in [[Thar]], only to be captured by the [[orog]] [[Daazlag]] and his [[orc]] minions.

Kara was imprisoned in a cave in [[XÃ»l-Jarak]] with all her friends. Kara was waiting for the right time to escape but had no ready [[spell]]s.
document_data.Relationship: Kara was infatuated with Elaint Marsk, a thing that pleased her father [[Andros Calaudra]]. She had a [[raven]] familiar called [[Esselion]].
